frontmatter.author: Jonathan Safran Foer
frontmatter.title: Food choices are determined by many factors, but reason (even consciousness) is not generally high on the list.

frontmatter.author: Martin Luther King, Junior
frontmatter.title: [A]n individual who breaks a law that conscience tells him is unjust, and who willingly accepts the penalty of imprisonment in order to arouse the conscience of the community over its injustice, is in reality expressing the highest respect for law.
